description: Try our easy to follow Lychee Fritters recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet fritter,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Lychee Fritters Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs icing sugar (save 1 tbs for dusting)

recipeInstructions.text: Beat cream cheese, icing sugar and lemon rind together until smooth. Stir in coconut. Using a teaspoon, fill each lychee with cream-cheese mixture. Place on a tray and repeat with remainder. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour or until firm.
Whisk egg yolk in a large bowl to loosen. Whisk in soda water. Add both flours and, using a fork, roughly stir until just combined when lumps will be visible.
Heat oil in a deep saucepan or deep-fryer.

Place extra flour in a shallow bowl. Toss chilled lychees in flour to lightly coat, shaking off excess. Dip in batter and allow the excess to drip off. Cook, in batches of about 6 at a time, for 2 minutes, turning halfway through until pale golden in colour. Drain on a paper towel.
Stand for 2 minutes before serving dusted with icing sugar.
